title: If made a candy with wine can it be preserved for years? - Quora

response.answer_text: First off, the alcohol in the wine will cook out per the high temperatures used in candy making. Also, candy has an age just like anything made from natural ingredients. If you were able to preserve the candy by freezing then the candy could last for some years. Without freezing the candy’s ingredients will start to break down before a year has passed. Lastly, humidity and heat play a huge role in the longevity of candy.
Wine would not necessarily preserve a candy for years as it can degrade for a number of other reasons beside bacterial infection.
